SELECT e.id, e.name, e.phone, e.extension, e.email, e.profile_url AS profileUrl,
ej.job_code AS jobCode, j.name AS jobName,
ed.department_code AS departmentCode, d.name AS departmentName,
eo.organization_code AS organizationCode, o.name AS organizationName,
es.reg_date AS hireDate, es.employment_status AS status, esc.name AS statusName
FROM employee e
LEFT JOIN employee_job ej ON e.id = ej.employee_id LEFT JOIN job j ON ej.job_code = j.code
LEFT JOIN employee_department ed ON e.id = ed.employee_id LEFT JOIN department d ON ed.department_code = d.code
LEFT JOIN employee_organization eo ON e.id = eo.employee_id LEFT JOIN organization o ON eo.organization_code = o.code
LEFT JOIN employment_status es ON e.id = es.emp_id LEFT JOIN employment_status_code esc ON UPPER(es.employment_status) = UPPER(esc.code)
WHERE e.id = #{id}
